autonomous_virtual_machine_ids.description: The list of unique identifiers for the Autonomous VMs associated with this database server.

autonomous_vm_cluster_ids.description: The OCID of the autonomous VM clusters that are associated with the database server.

cloud_exadata_infrastructure_id.description: The identifier of the database server to retrieve information about.

compute_model.description: The compute model of the database server.

cpu_core_count.description: The number of CPU cores enabled on the database server.

created_at.description: The date and time when the database server was created.

db_node_storage_size_in_gbs.description: The allocated local node storage in GBs on the database server.

db_server_patching_details.description: The scheduling details for the quarterly maintenance window. Patching and system updates take place during the maintenance window.

display_name.description: The display name of the database server.

exadata_infrastructure_id.description: The exadata infrastructure ID of the database server.

id.description: The identifier of the the database server.

max_cpu_count.description: The total number of CPU cores available.

max_db_node_storage_in_gbs.description: The total local node storage available in GBs.

max_memory_in_gbs.description: The total memory available in GBs.

memory_size_in_gbs.description: The allocated memory in GBs on the database server.

oci_resource_anchor_name.description: The name of the OCI resource anchor.

ocid.description: The OCID of the database server to retrieve information about.

region.description: Region where this resource will be [managed](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/rande.html#regional-endpoints). Defaults to the Region set in the [provider configuration](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/hashicorp/aws/latest/docs#aws-configuration-reference).

shape.description: The shape of the database server. The shape determines the amount of CPU, storage, and memory resources available.

status.description: The status of the database server.

status_reason.description: Additional information about the current status of the database server.

vm_cluster_ids.description: The OCID of the VM clusters that are associated with the database server.
